name: El Suelo
description:
A cute scientifically based gardening simulator, where you can peacefully, or not, garden, water and plant your desired flower. 

All of the flowers require different types of soil, so be carefull where you plant, remember to water your plants so they keep growing stronger and faster.

Controls:

  • [W,A,S,D] = move
  • X = View current tile
  • Q = Water current tile
  • E = Plant on current tile
  • R = Examine current  tile
  • I = Inventory of plants

Credits

  • Original Idea: Alfonso Valderrama
  • Product Owner: Lía Da Silva
  • Programming: Alfonso Valderrama & Lía Da Silva
  • Art: Lía Da Silva
  • Sound Effects: Alfonso Valderrama
